title: Can Make Palindrome From Substring
description:
You are given a string s and array queries where queries[i] = [lefti, righti, ki]. We may rearrange the substring s[lefti...righti] for each query and then choose up to ki of them to replace with any lowercase English letter.
If the substring is possible to be a palindrome string after the operations above, the result of the query is true. Otherwise, the result is false.
Return a boolean array answer where answer[i] is the result of the ith query queries[i].
Note that each letter is counted individually for replacement, so if, for example s[lefti...righti] = "aaa", and ki = 2, we can only replace two of the letters. Also, note that no query modifies the initial string s.
 
Example :

Input: s = "abcda", queries = [[3,3,0],[1,2,0],[0,3,1],[0,3,2],[0,4,1]]
Output: [true,false,false,true,true]
Explanation:
queries[0]: substring = "d", is palidrome.
queries[1]: substring = "bc", is not palidrome.
queries[2]: substring = "abcd", is not palidrome after replacing only 1 character.
queries[3]: substring = "abcd", could be changed to "abba" which is palidrome. Also this can be changed to "baab" first rearrange it "bacd" then replace "cd" with "ab".
queries[4]: substring = "abcda", could be changed to "abcba" which is palidrome.

Example 2:

Input: s = "lyb", queries = [[0,1,0],[2,2,1]]
Output: [false,true]

 
Constraints:

1 <= s.length, queries.length <= 105
0 <= lefti <= righti < s.length
0 <= ki <= s.length
s consists of lowercase English letters.
starter_code:
class Solution:
    def canMakePaliQueries(self, s: str, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[bool]:
preamble:
from typing import *
from collections import *
from functools import *
from itertools import *
from heapq import *
from bisect import *
from math import *
import math, collections, functools, itertools, bisect, heapq, string, re
check_function:
def check(candidate):
    assert candidate(s = "abcd",queries = [[0, 2, 1], [1, 3, 1]]) == [True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz",queries = [[0, 25, 12], [0, 25, 13], [0, 25, 14]]) == [False, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "zaz",queries = [[0, 2, 1], [0, 1, 0], [1, 2, 0]]) == [True, False, False]
    assert candidate(s = "abcda",queries = [[3, 3, 0], [1, 2, 0], [0, 3, 1], [0, 3, 2], [0, 4, 1]]) == [True, False, False, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "aaaa",queries = [[0, 3, 0], [1, 2, 0]]) == [True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "aabbc",queries = [[0, 4, 2], [1, 3, 1]]) == [True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "aaaa",queries = [[0, 3, 0], [0, 2, 0], [1, 3, 0]]) == [True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "aabbc",queries = [[0, 4, 1], [1, 3, 0]]) == [True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "lyb",queries = [[0, 1, 0], [2, 2, 1]]) == [False, True]
    assert candidate(s = "abcd",queries = [[0, 0, 0], [1, 1, 0], [2, 2, 0], [3, 3, 0], [0, 3, 2]]) == [True, True, True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "abcdedcba",queries = [[0, 8, 0], [1, 7, 1], [2, 6, 2]]) == [True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "abcd",queries = [[0, 0, 0], [1, 1, 0], [2, 2, 0], [3, 3, 0], [0, 3, 2], [0, 3, 3]]) == [True, True, True, True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "aabbc",queries = [[0, 4, 0], [0, 4, 1], [0, 4, 2]]) == [True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "mississippi",queries = [[0, 10, 3], [2, 8, 2], [0, 4, 1]]) == [True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "abcdefghijkilmnopqrstuvwxyz",queries = [[0, 25, 12], [1, 24, 11], [2, 23, 10], [3, 22, 9], [4, 21, 8], [5, 20, 7], [6, 19, 6]]) == [True, True, True, True, True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "racecar",queries = [[0, 6, 0], [1, 5, 0], [2, 4, 0], [0, 5, 1], [1, 4, 1]]) == [True, True, True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "mississippi",queries = [[0, 4, 1], [1, 5, 1], [2, 6, 1], [3, 7, 1], [4, 8, 1], [5, 9, 1], [6, 10, 1]]) == [True, True, True, True, True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "aabbccddeeffgghhiijjkkllmmnnooppqqrrssttuuvvwwxxyyzz",queries = [[0, 51, 12], [10, 20, 5], [30, 40, 10], [25, 45, 20]]) == [True, True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "aaaaaaaaaabbbbbbbbbbccccccccccdddddddddd",queries = [[0, 9, 4], [10, 19, 5], [20, 29, 6], [30, 39, 7], [0, 39, 20]]) == [True, True, True, True, True]
    assert candidate(s = "almostapalindromeexample",queries = [[0, 20, 5], [5, 15, 3], [10, 20, 6], [0, 20, 8], [5, 15, 2]]) == [True, False, True, True, False]
